objects.description: [Maze](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0449) has disabled dynamic analysis and other security tools including IDA debugger, x32dbg, and OllyDbg.(Citation: McAfee Maze March 2020) It has also disabled Windows Defender's Real-Time Monitoring feature and attempted to disable endpoint protection services.(Citation: Sophos Maze VM September 2020)

external_references.description: Mundo, A. (2020, March 26). Ransomware Maze. Retrieved May 18, 2020.
Brandt, A., Mackenzie, P.. (2020, September 17). Maze Attackers Adopt Ragnar Locker Virtual Machine Technique. Retrieved October 9, 2020.
